Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI is more timely and can ask questions anytime, anywhere, but the efficiency of contacting teachers is very low, only in class or through email

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI feedback is often brief but not accurate enough, and teachers' responses are generally very accurate

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Accuracy and timeliness. Being able to obtain answers at any time is the advantage of AI
